Name: Funky Monkey
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
22.5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
30 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coconut shell or Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of toasted coconut strips.
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: Be sure to use a ripe or even over-ripe banana in this tropical style drink.
History: Created in 1998 by Tony Abou-Ganim, Las Vegas, USA.
